## BasePlot.setBorderColorFn() method

Set the border color function

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setBorderColorFn(fn: (sample: ISample, dp: DataProvider) => RGBColor): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fn | (sample: [ISample](./composition-plot.isample.md)<!-- -->, dp: [DataProvider](./composition-plot.dataprovider.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; RGBColor | Returns a border color for a given sample |

void
